lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: The building of the middle class, through commerce and entrepreneurial activity, is the key to building thriving communities around the world. lender.name: Gidget

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nelson
lender.loan_because: I know how hard life can be. I have been there and by doing this, its a way for me to thank you to the people who helped me by helping other people whose in need.
lender.occupational_info:
Life is full of dreams which lead to changes. I do believe that I am now living a career which stemmed from my dreams. Having been in the design field which started 8 years ago, I began working in Fashion, Interior Design/Decoration, and finally Graphic Design.
At present, Interior Design, Visual Arts and Photography are my passion. I push limits of design principles, breaking the rules to see perspective in a different way. In my work I apply a limit, but for myself, there is always place for more ...
... simplicity, yet sublimity ...

lender.name: Greg & Jean
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to be able to help people and see the results from what you give.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I also run a business and want to support other businesses

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Hans

lender.name: Sonya
lender.loan_because: I feel it is very important to give to others whenever possible to help them be who they want to be!

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I Want to help people, this seems like a perfect way to help make a big difference in someones life
lender.occupational_info: I maintain the General Ledger at a fortune 50 company

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference to someone so they can get out of the situation they are in. If everyone else lent a few dollars then there might not be poverty as we know in the world today. Maybe this might be the seeds of change around the world
lender.occupational_info: I teach a diesel engine trade to the youth of today. The demand is high in Canada for qualified trades people. I have taught for 12 years and have influenced a lot of youth in my teaching career which is rewarding.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: it allows me to leverage my success to help make a positive impact in someone's life, and contribute in a way that will hopefully offer long term reward to those we help.

lender.name: Jeanette & Jeff
lender.loan_because: These groups will make a difference and may even loan themselves at some point.

People that are trying often become successful and help far more people than those persons that don’t try.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people communicate and work through computers and technology.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are trying to better themselves and this seems like a good way to help them achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Simply put, I take family photos and add music to create a DVD that can be played on a television or a computer. I think of my work as creating a living scrapbook, hopefully a family keepsake.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: it changes lives.
lender.occupational_info: I train leaders in the developing world through community projects in business, medicine and education.

lender.name: Karen Karsten
lender.loan_because: Investing in possibilities for people to be able to live a creative and bountiful life is the best thing a person can do for the whole planet. Even small amounts can give people a much wider range of choices--and isn't choice what you want in your own life?
lender.occupational_info: I help people bring passion and purpose to their lives by guiding them to discover what it is they really want. Having the power to choose and design a life you love is possible for everyone.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to have so much, and I want to share it with others.
lender.occupational_info: I own GoldAllianceGroup.com, an online resource for new small business owners.

lender.loan_because: my brother got me started with this. What a cool Christmas present!

lender.name: Cristine
lender.loan_because: Where else can so little do so much?

lender.name: Kerri

I only wish I could go to this beauty shop myself, and personally patronize every one of the beautiful women I loaned money. Thank you kiva.org!
lender.occupational_info: I write about wellness. It's fun and helps me help others too.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and need to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I recognize how fortunate my life has been. Even though I am not wealthy by American standards, I know that a little bit of money can go a long way when it comes to helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I use words and a camera to share and tell people’s stories.

lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher at Archbishop Mitty HS. My students are responsible for these loans. They were challenged to raise a dollar each but easily donated more.

lender.name: Ashland University SIFE

lender.occupational_info: Ashland University Students in Free Enterprise is a non-profit student organization at Ashland University's Dauch College of Business and Economics in Ashland, OH. SIFE members are volunteer students who's mission is to promote free enterprise through education with the goal of enabling others to become successful in a free market economy.

lender.name: GLOBAL POVERTY RELIEF FO
lender.loan_because: Our support of KIVA is part of a diversified "mutual fund" approach we offer individuals, companies and community groups preferring a professionally managed distribution of donations collectively received.
lender.occupational_info:
The Global Poverty Relief Foundation is a humanitarian organization and not-for-profit registered charity whose mission is to help alleviate poverty in less developed communities outside Canada.
With no payroll obligations as all staff are volunteers, the foundation supports disaster and poverty relief programs under UNICEF, World Vision, Oxfam, CARE, Doctors Without Borders, the Red Cross and other international aid agencies.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it seems like a good idea.

lender.loan_because: it honors the ancestors and the unity of all humanity.
lender.occupational_info: we help traditional cultures save and protect themselves.

lender.name: Greta
lender.loan_because: luck dropped me into a life of privledge, opportunity, and family that believes in the duty we all have to lend a helping hand. We live in a beautiful world and hopefully piece by peace we will begin to realize the interconnectedness of all people. I'm here to spread my luck around.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am giving back to the world, we are all living in this world together and need to allow our actions to do the talking.

lender.name: The B's

lender.name: The Girls

lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and I have a part time job outside the home. I am very involved in raising funds for the childrens schools and my husband has his own business. I know how hard it is starting out and wish these new businesses much success!

lender.name: Alanna
lender.loan_because: I understand the flow of money and I would love to assist others in the positive experience of it. It also believe in being service to others and being a member of Kiva is an expression of that.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in the ability to find answers and solutions within themselves. lender.name: Jared W. Olen
lender.loan_because: I love Kiva! I started lending through Kiva with only $100, and now that $100 has touched the lives of so many people across the world. It's such a great feeling. I honestly cannot think of a better investment than that. Try it -- you won't be disappointed!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time law student in Los Angeles, CA, and I am a Graduate Gemologist. My primary law focus is on immigration, international law, human rights, asylum, and refugees. I am also a diamond consultant for a diamond-cutting and retail firm.

lender.loan_because: it seems to work.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to promote local economic development. I try and do it here in the communities around my goat farm in Northern Virginia, and I want to be able to help farther afield as well.

lender.name: kathe

lender.occupational_info: I teach Art & Ceramics to high school students and I am an artist. I paint and draw and write stories.

lender.name: Leslie

lender.name: Hans

lender.name: Elizabeth & Emily
lender.loan_because: Because it's such a wonderful way to help those who need it, yet don't even know.

lender.name: peggy
lender.loan_because: It's very exciting that my small contribution can have so much impact for one of my global neighbors. It lifts me up--I feel connected to a greater good!
lender.occupational_info: I live in one of the most beautiful places on earth (of course we all think that, don't we), and coach people who want to improve their accent in English. Sometimes, I make art. Sometimes I write resumes and sometimes I do translations of company HR documents.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Kiva's an outstanding way to support quality of life around the world!

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I want to support women-owned businesses. Currently I am concentrating on African nations. Now through Kiva I can learn about the progress and see if there are any results.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an upscale senior community in San Luis Obispo, Ca near the central coast of California. I work closely with seniors to make sure they are well taken care of and all their needs are provided for correctly.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I believe small loans can make a big difference, and for that reason I'm committed to helping as much as a can.
lender.occupational_info: I run a family business that employees 75 people. We make craft products for kids and classrooms.

I was contracted to work for varying lengths of time. I am currently enrolled in a master's program for nursing. I enjoy my studies and my work :)

lender.name: TradingChief.Com
lender.loan_because: the members of TradingChief.Com believe in helping each other out. We do it now for our own "trading family". We watch out for each other, we try to encourage others to always look, and move ahead, always!! New ideas, intensive planning, for both the short and long term are part of our daily life
lender.occupational_info: We analyze 1000's of stocks on all North American exchanges and attempt to capitalize on the difference between the low price of the day and the high price. This is called the "spread". That is where we either make money or lose it.

lender.name: Lewis
lender.loan_because: We have to change the world by doing - not just by saying something should be done.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I want to share with others in appreciation of the many blessings God has given me and to share the love of Jesus Christ through giving to others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in Quality Assurance and Research for a major packaging company in the U.S.A .

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others...particularly those that have less, but have great self responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: Help people do great things.

lender.name: Jason & Ludi
lender.loan_because: we owe the world for all that it has given us.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: It is the right think to do...to help someone who wants to make a better life for their families....
lender.occupational_info: I help companies use software to help their businesses become profitable.

lender.name: Hope & Tess
lender.loan_because: It's nice to know that you can have such a great impact on people's lives.

lender.name: Natalya
lender.loan_because: all people should have the chance to create a sustainable way to care for themselves, their families, and ultimately, their communities.

lender.name: Reese and Arie
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lender.name: christian
lender.occupational_info: Building construction trades

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with abundance and would like to share with others to help improve their lives and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for one of the largest media and entertainment companies in the world. I help promote family entertainment and travel experiences.

lender.name: Christopher Hammock
lender.loan_because: I feel that I was born into a position of privilege in this world and that I have a responsibility to help those who were less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: Loans helped me achieve my goals, and I want to help those who work hard!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick and injured people.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I love to see women working to make change and better their's and their family's lives.

lender.name: Skip
lender.loan_because: I am amazed by how so little can do so much!

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I desire to give back a part of my income that God has given to me. I desire to help the less fortunate.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I can and want to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I fix teeth for people.

lender.name: Sarah & Eric
lender.loan_because: We like making a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help students with their problems so that they can become better citzens of the world.

lender.name: Carolyne
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful for the blessings and opportunities given to us by God. Out of that thankfulness, I want to help others and this is a practical and simple way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer.

lender.name: cherian
lender.loan_because: I have agricultural land,but no money to invest for a handsome return.
lender.occupational_info: I will utilize the land for cultivation of plants which yield more cash(medicinal and horticultural),promote mushroom cultivation,promote rearing of animals for meat milk and manure, fuel(gober and biogas),grow birds for meat and eggs, grow fishes for food and aquarium etc,etc.....

lender.name: CG Houston, TX
lender.loan_because: I care. In my life, charity has always been important and micro-lending is a fabulous way to touch many people in a significant way. Thanks, Kiva!

lender.name: koch family
lender.loan_because: microfinance is doing a world of difference in the 2/3 world. when we make these loans, it doesn't enable but empowers these entrepenuers to move forward with their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: we are a family immersed in non-profit work in central KY. one with inner city youth coordinating programs at an afterschool center and the other as the executive director of an urban gardening nonprofit.

lender.name: Truman, Sophie & Dexter
lender.loan_because: "It's the impulse to give that puts you in touch with the best part of yourself"

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle" - Plato

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because:
I can. I don't have the courage to go to developing countries to help people on the spot, but helping out financially is something that I can do.
However insignificant the individual sums may be that ever lender gives to Kiva; put together these many tiny sums can help change a person's life permanently for better.
So if you can have a positive impact on the world you live in, why not act instead of watching from the sideline?
-------
Proud member of the Swap-bot Kiva Team : http://www.kiva.org/team/swapbot

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: I like to help other people and I want my children to learn about helping others as well.
lender.occupational_info: I work on an ambulance and help people in their hour of sickness. I also get to run into housesthat are on fire occasioally, and put them out.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: people need a hand up not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I build houses.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a start....

lender.name: Ian & Amanda
lender.loan_because: it's needed and we can do it.
lender.occupational_info: Amanda teaches young children. Ian manages a textile printing shop.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the chance to prosper financially.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a children's hospital in the medical records department.

lender.name: prana farm
lender.loan_because: God says to.
lender.occupational_info: funky!

lender.name: Ralph & Donna
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows us to help less fortunate people.

lender.name: drew
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy
lender.occupational_info: i represent manufacturers

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I am a serial entrepreneur and enthusiastic to help those with the will, energy, passion and courage to create and run their own ventures. Ultimately many create jobs - a most noble endeavor. The more we can help others be self-sufficient the better and more at peace our world will be.
lender.occupational_info: I am the CEO of a U.S. based company that provides services and engineers software for Air Medical Transport providers (helicopters and fixed wing). We have a noble mission and can help individuals - often in dire circumstances - survive to be here longer with their loved ones and to be productive citizens. I am the proud father of a son who is a newly registered barber - so - in his honor my first investment is in a barber shop. I too am extremely proud of my daughter who is an advocate for women's empowerment - therefore I am honored to invest in women entrepreneurs.

lender.name: vasco
lender.loan_because: Ive been very fortunate in my life.

lender.name: Tek
lender.loan_because: I believe, loans like Kiva loans, the most effective ways of lending a "hand". Allows us as members of the human community an efficient way of helping each other. Some day I dream of all the people who were helped helping others in whatever way they can.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company grow by building coumputer systems to solve complex business problems that would be harder to do without computers.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: As a former small business owner and a historian, I recognize the crucial role that small businesses play and have played in developing economies. Historically, agricultural revolution and industrialization in Europe was the product of hundreds of thousands of small entrepreneurial investments. It makes sense that development elsewhere requires the same.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history to university students.

lender.name: Bibi
lender.loan_because: I care and want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Clear goals, hard work, dedication, honesty, respect and patience.

lender.name: Hank
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone out. With just $25 (1 week of starbucks) you can make such a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Helping grape growers grow better grapes.

lender.name: travis and stacy
lender.loan_because: it makes cents.
lender.occupational_info: I helps students that want to go to school.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: Other people have helped me. Now it is my turn to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a factory that creates computer chips.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: It just seems like the right thing to do, so many of the people who apply for micro loans are just like me except living in a different country and I honestly would like to believe if the situation were reversed that they would help me.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites, some of which I give away for free, I also create clip art for clients. My passion is horticulture,cooking and sewing.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I understand how lucky I am, and want to recognize those women who have thrived in more hostile environments.
lender.occupational_info: Like many of the entrepenuers on this site, I work whenever and however I can to pay the bills. But my heart sings when I can work to change the world.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I think this idea is great. I personally heard stories of this micro loan idea really helping people in bangladesh from a co worker who has family there.
lender.occupational_info: Basically I drive food to peoples houses. And I use the tips (extra money people give me to show appreciation) to fund my account on this site.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and because I can, I should.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to the Grameen Bank concept and microcredit through a course I teach at FDU in NJ. This is a fantastic and exciting program.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Philosophy, Spanish, American History and "Global Challenge" in three universities in NJ.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can have a positive impact on the life of another person so they can have a positive impact on others.
lender.occupational_info: I look at how my company does business and find ways to make the work easier or more profitable.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: As a business owner I think Kiva is a fantastic way to help create and support self-sufficiency which makes us all feel better about ourselves and our families.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and businesswoman. I work mostly with metal and gems, creating the tiniest of jewelry to life-sized sculpture.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: It's cool.
lender.occupational_info: As a channel relationship manager, it's my job to make sure that the sales channels have the marketing tools needed to sell my company's products and services.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: such a small amount of money can have such a big impact on someone's life.

lender.name: Spa 1 Repair
lender.loan_because: To pay forward life's gifts & to touch the lives of people around the world, hoping that in some small way, my company and my life can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Making the world a better place by seeing how many smiles I can put on people's faces every day is my life's goal. I earn a living by repairing barber shop, beauty salon, day spa equipment and chiropractice and medical furniture repair

lender.name: Kurtis
lender.loan_because: I believe very strongly that free markets and charitable giving will pull people out of poverty - not government intervention. Government aid agencies enrich corrupt governments and should be abolished. The picture is of "Spuds" my best friend who had to be put down when he went blind.
lender.occupational_info: Even though I am on disability because of schizophrenia (a mental condition that results in hallucinations and abnormal behavior) I still manage to make money investing in other companies. I also believe that even in the United States people like myself would be better served by charities than by the government.

lender.name: Ray & Judy
lender.loan_because: To give something directly back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: Retired police officer, retired government worker

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help women succeed in business to enhance their lives.

lender.name: kikelomo
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are one
lender.occupational_info: I am a married mother of two young boys 5 & 2 . I grew up all over the world and I want to give back to faces I can see.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I think it is great to be able to assist those who are willing to work and put forth great effort get what they need to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I do all kinds of computer work, including building web sites.

lender.name: LaVonda
lender.loan_because: Indirectly someone helped me and I'm passing that spirit on to someone else that could use some HOPE!
lender.occupational_info: I help people protect what's near and dear to them through insurance.

lender.name: Donn
lender.loan_because: it teaches people to be self sufficient.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I have been privileged my entire life. I graduated college without any debt, I live 5 houses from the ocean, I have an incredible job and I could not have done any of this without my parents and their finances. It has been hard enough to begin my professional career without having financial concern, and so I have decided to give others some of the peace of mind that comes with having money to run with your dreams and support yourself or even your family. I hope that I can make a small difference somewhere in the world that without Kiva I would not have been able to reach out to.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a multi million dollar book of business for a large international software technology company. My goal is to increase product sales and revenue within my book of business every year.

lender.name: Haven
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I own and run a small home furnishings boutique.

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: i believe I am my brother's keeper and this is a great way of showing that. I am also very interested in helping women who need a 'hand up' so that they can live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse and I work in a small hospital.

lender.name: Alyssia
lender.loan_because: "We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone." ~Dr. Loretta Scott
lender.occupational_info: I help others become leaders in their businesses by learning how to take care of their employees and customers.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: i want to help start up businesses.

lender.name: Inwha
lender.loan_because: it will help the poorest segment of the emerging economies develop.
lender.occupational_info: Provide debt facilities to corporates financial institutions and governments.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I care about people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 6 year olds.

lender.name: Ryan Seda
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!
lender.occupational_info: Auditor / Quality Control

lender.name: MELISSA
lender.loan_because: God continues to bless me so I can in turn be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: My company performs oil field related jobs. Among many other things, I basically account for all billings and costs of all jobs in each of our legal entities. I then prepare each jobs work in progress. I make all necessary journal entries for each entity’s financial statements and I prepare the consolidated statements.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe people should help each other and I like to help those who are willing and able to work to help themselves if given the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a small time trader. I buy and sell arts and handicrafts.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is a fun and interesting way to help women take charge and improve their lives.

lender.name: Mohanbabu
lender.loan_because: I believe every individual can impact the world by helping others
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Senior software engineer in a start-up company

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I knew poor! I did'nt like it....

lender.name: dani
lender.loan_because: this is a great opportunity to help people all over the world help themselves.

lender.name: Barth
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: Unfortunately we live in a world where money does get you things that help you survive. I have some that someone else does not. I believe in giving to the world and this is one way to do that. Peace.

lender.name: AlexInWilderland
lender.loan_because: The world is a better place for all, when there is less suffering for every individual and every animal, and when the earth itself is cared for with love. We are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I help people achieve their dreams. I care for animals, and I help to preserve the wilderness from destruction.

lender.name: Delbert
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe it is our responsibility to help others when we can. Both my partner and I are lenders with Kiva and we really enjoy it. In future we will be increasing our loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office assisting lawyers in the area of real estate, buying and selling commercial real estate and businesses.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: one day, I too will need to borrow money.
lender.occupational_info: I do those things other people cannot be bothered with.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help where I can.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I count my blessings every day. I was raised to help others.
lender.occupational_info: My customers send me flower petals and I make them into beads. I them string them into rosaries or jewelry. God has blessed me.

lender.name: Mrs. Michelle
lender.loan_because: I, too, was an entrepreneur...and I loved every moment of it. I remember the struggles of getting my business off it's feet. I LOVED having my business!
lender.occupational_info: I have been disabled for over a year now, but getting back on my feet. Looking for the perfect job to jump back into! Unfortunatey, I had to close my internet business, donating all of my inventory (597 brand new, designer, red-carpet gowns) to a local hospice. Before having my business, a couple jobs that I had were: Producer at Fox TV and I also worked at a travel agency that specialized in cruising. Right now, I just am busy getting well and raising my 3 teenage daughters.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to make a difference in the world, but never knew how.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: Sometimes its the little things that make a big difference. I enjoy helping deserving people reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info:
QUICK-TURN collaborates with other entrepreneurs to restore old homes and other structures... and build new ones... for the homeless and families in crisis.
QUICK-TURN provides excellent resources via a network of friends and supporters who truly care!
QUICK-TURN helps people deal with life choices regarding shelter... food... healthcare... career... education... etc...
